desc: create your frist event using this tutorial

content.content: Login or Sign up to get started
Sellect the packages and pay the bill to get acces on our dashboard
After you pay the bill, you can add your first event on the dashbord, and fill all of the field required
Check your preview after you finishing the form, if you want to change you can just close it and change it from field labeled 'event tamplate'
click create event and wait until the event created by the server
after the event ready you can see through the event dashboard

desc: manage your participants using this tutorial

content.content: enter your event you want to manage your participant
look down into the table labeled 'participants table' and search for the participant you want to manage

span.content: if you dont see the participant it means you havent added any participant yet

content.content: theres two ways for you to add participant, you can add it manually or import an exle file into the web

span.content: look at the button labeled 'add participant', if you click this button you will be the add the participant manually, but if you click another button with paper icon it would be making you import an excel file

content.content: enter the number you want make your own participant

span.content: you still can add the participant later, but this is the first step

content.content: fill the field require until you finished, and the wait untill server throwing a success message
you should make a excel file with these columns with header format like this 'name', 'email', 'position'

span.content: if your format not like this, the server will throw an error

content.content: once you done with that, just wait until server throwing a success message, and heres our participant in participants table

desc: donwload your qr code using this tutorial

content.content: pick the user you want to download the qr code or you can just download all of them
click the button you want to download the qr code
after you click the button dialog bar will appear to your screen and ask you for the file ext you want

span.content: click download as, and choose the file extension you want to download it

desc: mannage your event more easy with this tutorial

content.content: enter the event you want to manage
click the small button in the left button of the event banner
theres a menu you can choose to manage the event
after you click the button dialog bar will appear to your screen and ask you for the file ext you want

span.content: click download as, and choose the file extension you want to download it

content.content: click the button says steakholder details
you can edit the steak holder and add the photo or do somethings to manage your event steakholder

span.content: dont forget to click update data button after you make any changes here

content.content: theres you can edit your tamplate of your event
click the button 'edit' in the menu you click before
edit the data you want to make changes

span.content: dont forget to click update data button after you make any changes here
